overall.notes: Demo judge: tighten clinical precision; end with a compliant next step.

turns.speaker: Rep
turns.text: Quick on-label update for HR+/HER2- mBC?

turns.speaker: HCP
turns.text: Thanks for the on-label query. Indication is after prior chemo in HR+/HER2- metastatic breast cancer (per SmPC sec. 4.1). Consider NCCN notes for sequencing.
